about_the_game:
Welcome Skaters!

Experience the thrill of TRICKSHOT - a revolutionary multiplayer shooter that's redefining the genre! Command your hoverboard or hoverskates and outperform rivals with epic skate tricks in diverse interstellar arenas.

Fuel up with Health, Shields, and Ammo by skating, and rack up bonus points with successive tricks, parkour, tackles, power-ups, and slides. Eliminate opponents, but remember - it's not just about the kill count! Only the player with the highest points at the end of the match prevails.

Drawing inspiration from the swift skate mechanics of Tony Hawk Pro Skater & Jet Set Radio, and the rapid-fire gunplay from shooters like Doom Eternal, TRICKSHOT offers an electrifying fusion of exhilarating action and strategy.

Features:

  • Customize your skater character to reflect your unique flair
  • ngage in epic battles online in diverse skatepark arenas
  • Experience both offline and online play featuring player bots
  • Conquer thrilling ramps, master sick grind rails, flip and dive with parkouring
  • Take a breather from the intense PvP action and unwind with friends in your very own Personal Skate Park HUB World

Your WISHLISTs and positive energy means the world to us! Stay in the loop with all the latest game updates by joining our DISCORD community. Thanks for dropping by!

name: TrickShot

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz | AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM or better) | AMD R9 270 (2GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64 bit Windows 10 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (6GB VRAM or better) | AMD Vega 56 (6GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

short_description: Outwit, outplay, and outshine with gravity-defying skate tricks & parkouring, while battling in this thrilling skate-shooter mashup. Conquer as you dodge shots and deal crushing blows in skatepark arenas using hoverboards or hover skates.
